basics.name: Boian Ivanov
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with a proven track record in designing and developing robust backend systems and user interfaces. Experienced in utilizing AWS services, Typescript, and a plethora of front-end frameworks to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions. Proficient in Agile methodologies and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects. Excited about the future of web development and eager to contribute to innovative projects.

work.name: Hyper SQ
work.summary: Pioneered the software development team in the company, leading the design and implementation of a scalable, real-time tracking platform. Conducted thorough research to select the optimal technology stack, considering business needs, limited staff resources, and security requirements. Evaluated existing prototypes and, working closely with the CEO in alignment with business requirements, architected a robust technology stack. Developed critical features, including user and admin APIs, an administrative tool, and real-time tracking capabilities. Architected a robust solution utilizing Typescript, PostgreSQL, AWS, Lambda, DynamoDB, Terraform, Cognito, Svelte, and Sentry to deliver a high-performance platform.

work.name: Daily Mail (dmg media)
work.summary: Responsible for designing and developing internal tools and backend services using AWS services. Leveraged Typescript to create robust and maintainable code. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

work.name: iTech Media
work.summary: Development of a fully reusable platform using SvelteKit with Typescript & Node.js, using Cloudflare workers and hosted on AWS, while using Contentful CMS and Tailwind CSS for the frontend. To manage that, I've championed the move to a monorepo structure via [Turborepo](https://turborepo.org/). Our in-house developed platform would allow for development speed on websites, full re-theming between them and also give full power to our content team to deliver their ideas to our users within minutes.

work.name: Zavamed
work.summary: Use of modern tech stacks to build the tools that will help our health clinics and doctors be as productive as possible. Working in an Agile environment we were able to achieve quick development and deployment of much needed features to be used by the wider business. Key technologies used: VueJS, AWS, Serverless, NodeJS, Jenkins, PHP, Kirby, PHPUnit, Buefy, Jest.

work.name: First Clarity
work.summary: Development and support of company clients’ websites. Redesigned The [Telegraph’s Puzzles](https://puzzles.telegraph.co.uk/) website from a Flash based to a fully mobile-friendly website. Supporting our in-house created engagement and monetisation platform, Evolok ([evolok.com](https://www.evolok.com/)).

Collaborating with successful local companies ([Rapido](https://www.rapido.bg/), [Econt](https://www.econt.com/), [Emag](https://www.emag.bg/), [Profitshare](https://bg.profitshare.com/), etc.).

Courses that were designed and taught by me where: ”[HTML & CSS Introduction](https://www.slideshare.net/BoianIvanov/html-introduction-bg)” and ”[Introduction to CMS for Designers (Wordpress & Joomla)](https://www.slideshare.net/BoianIvanov/introduction-to-cms-80147332)”.
